name: Project Tetra: Free Battle Royale, Team Deathmatch, FFA + Zombies!
name_original: Project Tetra: Free Battle Royale, Team Deathmatch, FFA + Zombies!
description:
Be the last man standing in a new Battle Royale-style mode, strike with your team or alone in Project Tetra! Project Tetra is a free, singleplayer, fun and intense FPS!

Patch Notes:

  • Arena Royale game mode! It's a Battle Royale style game mode, with a few changes.

    • Fast-paced - Matches last 5 minutes
    • Can be played offline! (Online multiplayer coming soon)
    • Last Player standing wins.
    • You can select your weapons before spawning
  • New Map, Lakemere! A massive map split into 4 distinct zones designed for Arena Royale:
    • Hectic Highrises - Extremely fast-paced, close quarters combat
    • Marvellous Mountains - Large and open area with a moderate amount of cover
    • Cottage Corn - A sleepy cottage with lots of building and tree cover
    • Frighting Forest - An open forest with lots of natural cover (trees and rocks).

  • Shotgun Changes - The shotgun was inconsistent, so this new update makes it a much more viable weapon!
  • Key bindings! Now you can change the default set-up of the controls!
  • New Sniper scope! This has enhanced zoom-in and is useful for long-range combat!
  • Tons of Ai fixes and improvements!
  • More graphics settings!
  • Lots of bug fixes!

NOTICE TO MAC USERS: You might need to download the game on the itch.io app for the game to work. This also means that all future updates will be installed as patches, so you will not need to re-install the game every update.

There are 4 modes:

  • Arena Royale! Be the last one standing in this new game mode!
  • Deathmatch: It's free-for-all in this mode! Eliminate all other players to win!
  • Team Deathmatch: Work with your team to achieve victory! VS up to 4 teams at once!
  • Zombies: Can you survive the night? Select the difficulty and prepare for waves of zombies!

There are 8 maps in total:

Zombies:

  • Hallways
  • City
  • Cottage

Team Deathmatch:

  • Arena
  • Alpha Base
  • Corridors
  • Village
  • Township

Deathmatch:

  • Arena
  • Desert
  • Village
  • Township

Arena Royale:

  • Lakemere

There are 7 weapons:

  • Rifle
  • Rocket
  • Pistol
  • Burst
  • Shotgun
  • SMG
  • Sniper

Project Tetra is currently in a open alpha and will be changed based on community feedback!

Future updates may include:

  • Zombie Update
  • Battle Royale Mode
  • Online Multiplayer
  • Vehicles
  • More Maps, Modes and Weapons

Stay tuned for more details!
